name: goldulf-dustpunch
description: No one's been through these archaeological sites in years, so there's plenty of detritus to keep you busy. The more cobwebs you punch, the more points you earn.

scripts.copy: copy src\index.html www\index.html && xcopy /e /v /i /y assets www\assets && copy src\service-worker.js www\service-worker.js && copy src\manifest.json www\manifest.json && copy sw-toolbox.js www\sw-toolbox.js
scripts.dev: webpack && npm run copy && webpack serve --mode development
scripts.prod: webpack && npm run copy && webpack serve --mode production
scripts.build: webpack --mode production && npm run copy && npx cap copy
